attributes.action: MINIMUM LIVING STATE PENSION FOR  UK PENSIONERS SHOULD BE £800.00 PER MONTH
attributes.additional_details: If any British citizen  has lived in the uk for a continuous period of  20 years and is above 65 years of age,  then he/ she should   automatically be  entitled to the living state pension of £800.00 per month with pension linked to  the actual inflation index without the application of notorious "means testing".
